chart-widget.widget.json: {"name":"ChartWidget","description":"Widget to display a chart from time series data","integration":{"type":"angular"},"compatibility":["json-patch"],"features":{"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","required":["timeSeries"],"properties":{"title":{"type":"object","properties":{"htmlLabel":{"type":"string","description":"Title for the chart."}}},"timeSeries":{"type":"object","description":"Provide the data to display in another widget.","required":["resource"],"properties":{"resource":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the data resource","format":"topic"}}},"chart":{"type":"object","description":"Set options for the chart representation.","properties":{"type":{"type":"string","enum":["pieChart","stackedAreaChart","multiBarChart"],"default":"pieChart","description":"Type of the chart, excepted types are defined in external library NVD3."}}}}}}

default.theme.data-provider-widget.html: {{$index + 1}}. {{item.description}}

data-provider-widget.widget.json: {"name":"DataProviderWidget","description":"Widget that provides other widgets with data.","integration":{"type":"angular"},"compatibility":["json-patch"],"features":{"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","required":["data"],"properties":{"title":{"type":"object","properties":{"htmlLabel":{"type":"string","description":"List selection title"}}},"data":{"type":"object","required":["resource","items"],"properties":{"resource":{"type":"string","description":"ID of resource to publish."},"items":{"type":"array","description":"An array of data sets of which a user can choose one to be published.","minItems":1,"items":{"type":"object","required":["title","location"],"properties":{"title":{"type":"string","description":"Title of the data set."},"description":{"type":"string","description":"Short description of the data set that is displayed below the title."},"location":{"type":"string","description":"URL to load the resource from when the submit button is pressed."}}}}}},"messages":{"type":"object","description":"Configuration of messages published via didEncounterError or didValidate events.","properties":{"i18nFailedLoadingResource":{"type":["object","string"],"description":"didEncounterError message to publish when a GET for a resource fails. [resource] is replaced by the actual name of the resource.","default":"Could not load resource \"[resource]\""}}}}}}

table-editor-widget.widget.json: {"name":"TableEditorWidget","description":"A widget that provides a spreadsheet-like content editor.","integration":{"type":"angular"},"controls":["laxar-date-picker-control"],"compatibility":["json-patch"],"features":{"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","required":["timeSeries"],"properties":{"title":{"type":"object","properties":{"htmlLabel":{"type":"string","description":"Editable table title"}}},"timeSeries":{"type":"object","description":"Shows the time series in an editable table.","required":["resource"],"properties":{"resource":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the data resource which should refer to a 2-dimensional array.","format":"topic"}}}}}}
